org.processmining.plugins.etm

Class CentralRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.processmining.plugins.etm.CentralRegistry
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CentralRegistryConfigurable

    public class CentralRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    The Central Registry is the central class that keeps track of (or contains a reference to) the event log, the event log info, the known event classes and the tree fitness values.
    Author:
    jbuijs

    • Field Detail

      • eventClasses

        protected org.deckfour.xes.classification.XEventClasses eventClasses
        An instance of the event classes separate from the log info since we might want to pretend we have less classes (e.g. consider only the top X most used eventclasses for discovery).

    • Constructor Detail

      • CentralRegistry

        public CentralRegistry(org.deckfour.xes.model.XLog log,
               java.util.Random rng)
        Creates a new tree factory that creates new nodes given a list of event classes for leafs and the probability of introducing intermediate function nodes
        Parameters:
        maxNodes - Maximum number of nodes of the tree
        eventClasses - Candidates for leaf nodes to choose from
        functionProbability - Probability of introducing function nodes even though we did not reach the maxNodes limit

      • containsFitness

        public boolean containsFitness(NAryTree tree)
        Function that checks whether there is already a fitness object for this tree in the cache. It ignores whether it is already set (use isFitnessKnown for that!)
        Parameters:
        tree -
        Returns:

      • clearFitnessCache

        public void clearFitnessCache()

      • increaseFitnessCache

        public boolean increaseFitnessCache(int minimalSize)
        Instructs the internal fitness cache that it should contain at least the specified number of candidates. Mainly used by the Pareto front to make sure that the whole front + some 'real' cache can be kept. The size of the new cache will be 1.5 times the requested size, if this is more than the current size.
        Parameters:
        minimal -
        Returns:
        boolean indicating whether the cache has been enlarged

      • getRandom

        public java.util.Random getRandom()

      • increaseGeneration

        public void increaseGeneration()
        Increases the generation counter with one. Should only be called from the evolution engine!!!

      • getCurrentGeneration

        public int getCurrentGeneration()

        public void updateEventClassifier(org.deckfour.xes.classification.XEventClassifier eventClassifier)
        Updates the classifier to the given one and also creates a new LogInfo instance and fires a changed event to trigger all listeners.
        Parameters:
        selectedItem -

      • considerTopEventClasses

        public void considerTopEventClasses(int topSize)
        Fools the rest of the ETM into thinking the event log only contains a subset of the event classes (e.g. the top X). This can be used to only consider frequent activity classes or to steadily increase the number of event classes considered during evolution. This will trigger an event to all listeners of this class.
        Parameters:
        topSize - The number of most frequent event classes to include. Provide negative value to consider all.

      • getaStarAlgorithm

        public AStarAlgorithm getaStarAlgorithm()
        Returns:
        the aStarAlgorithm

        the estimatedMinLogCost

      • updateLogDerived

        public void updateLogDerived()
